channel.title: How do I add new npc?
channel.description: I have problems adding stuff like custom items etc but I was wondering how to I add a hole new npc like nex and give it drops on my pi I can't find the drop rateing either.

item.title: How do I add new npc?
item.dc:creator: @Carter2 Carter_
item.description:
@Carter2 wrote:

I think he means adding a new NPC that doesn’t currently exist in the cache, i.e. the model, animations and ints.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add new npc?

item.title: How do I add new npc?
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

^ Or search on google, if you want to add a simple NPC for let’s say Shops then you need to find the NPC code for which you want and then add that into shops.cfg. There’s a certain layout you need to follow, if you don’t then you’ll get errors and the client won’t load.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add new npc?

item.title: How do I add new npc?
item.dc:creator: @Carter2 Carter_
item.description:
@Carter2 wrote:

Try http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,148.0.html

View the stickied posts there, they may be what you are looking for.

Read full topic
